summary: The friendship of two boys is tested to its limits as they battle for survival during the Kosovo war.
cast: Lum Veseli|Andi Bajgora|Melihate Qena|Luan Kryeziu|Eshref Durmishi|Astrit Kabashi|Xhevdet Jashari|Armond Morina|Aurita Agushi|Sunaj Raca|Eni Cani|Kushtrim Sheremeti|Fisnik Ademi|Besnik Krapi|Ardit Tahiri|Gentrit Musliu
title: Shok
